entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers and wet flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 4 cm near Enderby and Lumby. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing overnight. Snow level 900 metres. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
